name: RadioGroup
description: Wrap a group of Radio Buttons to automatically control their selection

props.name: initialValue
props.description: The initial value of the selected radio button

props.name: onValueChange
props.type: ((value?: string) => void) | ((value?: number) => void) | ((value?: boolean) => void) | ((value?: any) => void)
props.description: Invoked once when value changes, by selecting one of the radio buttons in the group
